title: Saying bye for a while now

comments.comment: PewDiePie will always and forever be the OG and the GOAT of YouTube. Thank you for a decade of memories.
12 years journey and now we’re here today. From a dude screaming in front of a screen now a father. I’m happy I got to be the part of this journey. Bro fist…

You can tell, more than usual, that this is Marzia editing. This is like a farewell to a lifestyle that is fading away. The whole video felt like sunset. So calm and peaceful. Pewds & Marzia look so happy and we are so happy for them. We wish them all the best for this next chapter.
So crazy to watch him transforming from a teenager to a mature father. Getting so close to someone you would never even meet on the street. Happy for you!
I know it’s just temporary (hopefully) but it feels like the proper end to a YouTube era. I am happy for Pewds. It’s been the ride of a lifetime for him. You deserve everything you have.

Throwback at 2013 when you stumbled into a Swedish dude with an accent playing Amnesia and weird horror games and now you’re watching him become a father, I can’t express how much place this man took up in my life, even if we’re not he always felt like a friend one that never failed to put a smile on my face and creat amazing memories for me and my brothers as we used to gather around when we were kids and watch outlast playthroughs together on the tv .
Anyway congratulations Pewds, we’re all very thankful and very proud of you
I cannot believe time has gone by so fast, we're proud of you Pewds, have a good life as a father
It’s so sad to see him take long breaks to finally live his life. Pewds you’ve definitely deserved the world you’ve helped me and so many others through all the years and I can’t thank you enough.
Seeing you with Marzia live happily as a family has me realized how long ago i first watching your videos. Let the next 10 years be as good as it was 10 years ago. Thank Pews for my childhood

This is the best rendition of “and they lived happily ever after” 

It’s been a wild but fun 9 years with you, Pewds. Been a fan since 2014 and I’ve seen you go through a lot. I’m so glad this is where you are now  you and Marzia enjoy parenthood! If this is goodbye, it’s OK. Wouldn’t have ended it any other way.

Thank you
I think we all knew this moment was about to come, enjoy Pewds. We love you.

As a Japanese who gets to go home about once a year, pewds doing gods work for me. He surfs where I live, everywhere he goes, so familiar to me I can even smell the waves, street, trees, sand, and food.
This dude raised all of us as kids basically. He deserves the world
It’s been real man. From 13 years old to 24 years old now, thanks for basically being my best friend growing up. Enjoy your life and know that you’ll always hold a place in so many of our hearts
Love you man

I have watched this guy for 12 years now. He's helped me through the roughest years of my life, and gave me the best memories. I'm 23 now, and I'll never forget him. We all love you so much pewdiepie.

Thank you pewds for keeping it suuuper REAL for the past years. We're all sure you're gonna be a super awesome Dad. Super admire this decision to focus more on your family. Wishing you, Marzia, and the little one all the happiness! Really looking forward to seeing even a bit of your experience through Dadhood~

I really became a PewDiePie fan after his early gaming phase. Over the years I have appreciated him for sharing his opinions which are usually very fair when you break them down. I think someone like PewDiePie being on top of YouTube for so long was a good thing for the community, especially because of his view of money and personal wealth. You've earned everything you've built man, I wish you and your family the best. You're a great father already.

kinda crazy when you think about it. we watched this man back when he was doing amnesia and all that  back home. and now hes  married , moved to japan and his family is getting bigger. and not once did he stop making our days better  ty felix for  the memories and content

Felix: I'm not very good at japanese
Japanese lady: But at least you're trying!
So wholesome.
I really don't think I have ever seen someone so completely happy and content as Pewds seems to be rn. It's incredibly heartwarming, beautiful. Thank you Pewds for sharing this with us. Brofist
Been a fan since I was 12, now I turn 22 this year. So proud of you, Pewds. You look happy.

I have watched you from middle school through today. I'm married, have a home, and many animals. Thank you for always being there to make me laugh all these years. It feels like a friend is saying goodbye, but hopefully not forever. Love you Pewds!

It's not goodbye after all. Pewds just need time for his family. Man, I love you since I've met you 10 years ago already. And even now in the almost darkest times in my life, my country I rewatch your videos and they hide me in the world of coziness, happiness, love and calm. Thank you for all of that! I love you, Marzia, Edgar, Maya, little Bjorn and all of your family.. Please be happy!

seeing him mature is so heartwarming. seeing him happy with the love of his life, them just enjoying the little things in life is so calming in a way to watch. very nice video pewds. stay safe and live a great life. love u.
I'm so happy for Felix and Marzia and to their soon little one. Live your life to the fullest, we're here to support you!
I wouldn't lift a finger in your position. I'd be a full-time husband/Dad. The baby years are so engrossing. Take a decade off and I'll still love to see you back!
Thanks for everything pewds, began watching at 9, I’m 20 now, thank you for all the laughs. Congrats on everything
Whether it’s temporary or it turns out to be permanent. You deserve it PewDiePie. I wish the best for you and your family bro
you raised us well, you’ll make a great father. love u pewds!
Felix has been such a good role model for so many people he’s gonna be an amazing dad.
If anyone deserves a long break, it's you. You've worked tirelessly for years & deserve to spend time with the family & relax! God, we love you, Pewds

Watching since I was 12, now I’m 22 

Thank you for all these years pewds we will be waiting, Enjoy your time with your kid congratulations!
This is a reminder that nothing can last forever. Thank you Felix for everything you've done and I wish you and your family the best.
This made me cry. We watched Pewds from the beginning. Silly, chaotic, and now, has matured so greatly. Can’t wait to see the future of your family!

Ugh, growing up is wild, from playing MW after class while watching your videos, to raising a family while watching your vids, its so heartwearming to have seen you grow in to the incredible person you are today. Thank you for being a distant friend to all of us and keeping us laughing. We love you Felix, enjoy fatherhood, its really something special
Knew this was coming for a while now, but it's still sad to say goodbye. Been watching for eleven or twelve years now and all there really is to say, is thank you.
He seems so at peace, I wish I could explain it. It is a bitter sweet moment though, knowing he’s going to be gone for a long time. The end of an era. Take care pewds. We’ll be here
We all thank you for being like a cool ass older brother to all of us.. we appreciate you pewds
It’s so fucking wholesome to see videos like this of You and your fam. Definitely emotional. Been watching you my whole life basically…. Crazy where the years go.
so cool to see Felix become the fun cool adult we all as children always hope to be
Seeing Felix grow into peak Swedish dad is so wholesome and I'm here for it. All the love to the family and hoping you all a wonderful time as new parents <3
Wishing Marzia a good delivery and a quick recovery! You both got this! The best parents a kid could ask for <3

Even if this comment gets lost in the void, I just wanna say that I’ve been SO blessed to go on this journey with you through your life! I’ve been an OG 9 year old since pre-amnesia days and it’s been great seeing you grow so much over the years! You’re such an amazing person, and even though you have no clue who I am, you’ve done so many great things in my life and the lives of others! I know you probably hear these stories all the time, but you saved me from suicide while I was being SA’d as a high schooler, in addition to giving me the strength and courage to both come out of the closet and pursue my own passions as a creator. I’m so incredibly proud of you as both a creator and a person. Congratulations on becoming a father, and enjoy a very well deserved retirement! Love you, pewds! 
Brofist!

He's touched so many lives by just being himself on camera. Thank you for being such a positive influence, Felix! I bet so many of us are sending love to you and Marzia for this new chapter of your lives.
Pewds didn’t get the good ending, he got the BEST ending. God bless you and your family man…the crown’s waiting for you whenever you return.
Goodbye for now and best of luck, Pewds. You're gonna be a great dad.
Seeing Felix and Marzia where they are now makes me so emotional. I’m really happy for them.
We love you pewds, we are all happy for you!
Thank you, Felix. For everything. We're all so insanely happy for you and wish you the best <3

Shit, dude. Feels like the perfect time to end a chapter. I was learning to read a clock when I starting watching pewds. I graduated high school last month. Crazy how long these videos have been a part of my routine. Cheers bro, you’re gonna be an awesome dad.

God it's crazy how much this video impacted me. I remember watching all of your videos wayyy back when I really was part of the nine year old army. Im heading off to college now and this video almost served as the perfect representation of the bridge from childhood to adulthood. Seeing Felix start a new chapter in his life as I start my own is truly a surreal moment.
The sweetest thing about these vlogs is knowing that Björn can watch these back and know what things mom and dad were doing while in the belly 🥹
This man carried the best of our childhood memories I’m glad he’s loving his life now and been able to grow this much️

Seeing Pewd goes from screaming at a camera to being a proud and happy dad is so wholesome.
Thank you for everything, take time off, raise a family and I’ll still be here to watch when your return.
I’m genuinely so happy for him and Marzia. Thanks for everything Felix

Honestly I thought this might be you saying goodbye for good, I'm glad it isn't. Thank you Felix, for all you've given us over the years. You've taken us through good times and bad, and we'll remember all the laughs we had along the way. Thank you for sharing a bit of your life with us even after making the huge step in moving to Japan. We're all so happy for you and Marzia, and are glad to have seen you grow and be with you throughout your journey. I wish you good fortune in the coming days as you learn to be a father to your son. I can't wait to see the next video no matter the wait, but if it so happens that it never comes, once again, THANK YOU!
I almost forgot... brofist.

I'm not crying, you're crying. I'm so happy and proud of Felix and Marzia. This made me think back to when I started watching both of them and I realize I've been watching them grow into this amazing little family. It's bittersweet and joyful and I wouldn't have it any other way. Much love!
this is the most bittersweet i have felt in a while. thanks for everything Pewds, you'd surely be missed
Pewds you’ve raise most of us back then we all know you’ll be a terrific father! We’re all so proud of you. Maya would’ve been just as happy for you two 🥹

To see Marzia and Felix spend time together like this is the most wholesome something I've ever seen, it brings a smile to my face.

Edit: Just realize how much of a moron I am for the massive grammatical error I've made, either way I'm still proud of him.
Take all the time you need Pewds.  You're gonna absolutely enjoy every bit of fatherhood.   Congratulations you guys, I'm extremely happy for you
All of us are grateful to have been a part of your journey pewds. Congrats on being a dad!!

You deserve this. I have been watching you since 2014 and damn your progression has been great to watch. Sad to see this break but also happy as hell to see you become a father. Youll be a great dad. Its crazy its been 9 years since i started watching you. Time flies... Until we meet again!

You've been a YouTube father to millions of us who grew up with you as a part of our childhood, I'm glad that you're becoming a father in your family soon now, we love you Felix and may life bring the best to you

Honestly more people need to vlog like this! Vlogs took a huge nose dive years ago when people kept trying to make them more and more extreme but I think everyone can agree this type of vlog style is the best.
It's all happy and feel good!

I normally don't write comments but this one brought me to tears somehow :) wanna thank this person for everything he'd done, been following for 10 years now and Felix feels like an older brother who just doesn't know about my existence)) had the laughs, the cries, tears of joy and happiness. I'm sure Felix will be a great dad! happy for them both

title of this video: "saying bye for a while now"

title of the next video (made in the same month): "I made a street lamp"

You know what they say... "Don't cry because its over, smile because it happened." 
Thanks Felix, for everything
the past 10 years with you have been a blast; you and marzia will make great parents !! Good luck with everything Felix :)

I’ve been watching since I was an actually 9 year old, now I am 19. I have grown with this channel and this video finally showed me how fast life goes and how easily you can take it for granted. You were there for us to give us so many happy memories, now it is time to make some with your own family, thank you for everything and always, BROFIST!

I’ve been a fan since I was 9 years old (ironic right?) and now I’m 21. It’s been an amazing journey and so crazy to see how much he has grown. I wish you so much happiness Felix taking care of your son and just living life. ️

Hey I’m a grown man and I almost feel like crying. I began watching you when I was 13, now I’m almost 25. It’s just so crazy. I’m so happy for you Felix, you deserve the best. I wish you a happy life as a Dad. And with Marzia as the Mom, nothing can ever trouble you both, whatever happens

It really just hit me how much growth Felix has gone through.
From screaming at Slender, shitposting and getting into controversy and now slowing down to focus on what truly matters to him. Dude's an inspiration.
Congratulations Felix, you’ll be a great dad. It hits us dads the most once you see your child is born.

I found you YYYEEAAARRSSS ago, and have loved seeing the growth of your channel.  You deserve this and more Pewds.  You and your lovely wife deserve so much of what is doing with a new life on the way
I love how positive and supportive our community is. Felix has grown a lot and I wish the best for them and their lil one.
haven't watched Pewds in a long time but this was really peaceful and feels like the end of an era. Best of luck on this new adventure.
I felt my chest tighten a bit. Its an end of a legendary era and im so happy to have witnessed it all. Thank you from the bottom of my heart.

So proud of you. I'm so happy that you've found your little piece of paradise that you belong in. Ten years of being subbed has shown me this HUGE profile of who "Pewdiepie" is. His struggles, his controversies, his recognition and fame, his troubles, his happy spaces, his ups and downs- and we see this point where it seems you've officially come into your own as a man. Even if you don't come back for years, it's been an absolute pleasure and I'll never forget you or your contributions to the internet and to my life. Thanks, Felix. -  From a sub since 3rd of March, 2013.
Proud to have been a bro. At one point I never missed a video. What a monumental person he is... I will never forget you, pewds. Thank you for everything you've given us.

I know this isn’t goodbye and we’ll see you again soon Felix, but thank you for being such a huge part of making everyone’s day better, the entertaining content and memories over the last decade, it’s crazy how far we’ve made it, and now going to be a dad  You will ALWAYS be the OG King of YouTube 
See you soon Felix
That’s okay Pewds. You’ve worked so hard for us.
We all collectively said “this is the man we want to live this life”. Enjoy your family Pewds, all the hard work you deserve it.

Watching you from the height of your career to now having your own family makes me realize how much time had gone by. You deserved all the breaks Pewds! Come back whenever you want and I hope Marzia have a safe delivery

I think we can all agree that we're absolutely happy for Felix! Came a long way with such amazing content over the years, its great to see them achieve their dreams. We'll miss you but we hope you'll come back soon and enjoy your lives!

I got tears in my eyes seeing this dude so happy. Thank you Pewds for everything. You will forever be my favourite man on this platform! Hope you and Marzia have a great and happy time with the new family member. See you soon my dude!

I've known you since I was 14. Now I'm 25, and I have no words to explain how grateful I am for everything you've given. Thank you Felix. You deserve this happy ending. Now it's time for us to find ours. Brofist everyone!
Been a bro for a decade now and yours and Marzia’s videos have been a huge part of my life. Congratulations to your new family and best wishes to all of you!!

Man, I almost feel like crying a little bit. I’ve watched you since I was a kid back when you first started Fridays with Pewdiepie and were doing your original Amnesia series. It’s so weird to think about your content no longer being ongoing, but I’m also extremely happy about seeing you and Marzia having such a great, thriving life. I know you’ll be an amazing dad. All the best wishes!

seeing felix over the years really brings me to tears. i remember watching him play games back in the day. i still remember watching marzia’s videos as well and just watching believe in eachother. and now we get to watch 2 people experience true happiness. their lives are like a movie and they deserve every second of it

The brofist at the end felt really nostalgic in a very good way. Safe delivery to Marzia and good luck in becoming parents. It's kind of the most fun and rewarding type of hassle one can get into. Looking forward for the next vlog!

Feels like the end of an era. You look like my uncle now, one of the best men in the world he is.  Through light and dark times, it's been a pleasure to see you thrive. All the best to you and yours, Pewds. Bro-fist.
Have a wonderful break!!
That was the fastest retirement and comeback ever.

I know this isn't goodbye. I also know your and Marzia's lives will become a lot more busy once the little one comes out. This is a big step in a person's life and I'm really happy you two are ready for this next chapter and you specifically poods, you're ready to be a proper father. Take all the time you need! Of course, I'd love to see you at least once a month but I could understand if that is not going to happen. As always, you and Marzia are both a big inspiration to us all and the way you treat life is amazing. Thank you for this video! I love you guys and I'll be here no matter how long it will take for the next upload to happen.
The fact that Felix could definitely afford to employ someone to do the handy work around his home but chooses to do it himself makes me love the dude so much more!
I don't think I have seen Felix so happy ever. I am so happy for him living the best of his life every day.
Your gonna be incredible parents, so proud of you both thanks for a decade of happiness through a lot of dark times
We getting lil pewdies!!!
